p: The results of the antimicrobial assay are presented in Table 2. The laurel fruit EO in this study showed low inhibitory activity against Gram-positive bacteria Staphylococcus aureus and Kocuria rhizophila, Gram-negative bacterium Salmonella abony, yeast Saccharomyces cerevisiae, and fungus Aspergillus brasiliensis. However, the fruit EO did not show inhibitory activity against Gram- negative bacteria Es—Åherichia coli and Pseudomonas aeruginosa.
